storage-length:
Returns the number of key/value pairs currently present in the list associated with the
object.
storage-key:
Returns the name of the nth key in the list, or null if n is greater
than or equal to the number of key/value pairs in the object.
storage-clear: Empties the list associated with the object of all key/value pairs, if there are any.
sessionstorage:
Returns the Storage object associated with that origin's session storage
area.
localstorage:
Returns the Storage object associated with that origin's local storage
area.
Throws a "SecurityError" DOMException if the
Document's origin is an opaque
origin or if the request violates a policy decision (e.g. if the user agent is
configured to not allow the page to persist data).
storageevent-key: Returns the key of the storage item being changed.
storageevent-oldvalue: Returns the old value of the key of the storage item whose value is being changed.
storageevent-newvalue: Returns the new value of the key of the storage item whose value is being changed.
storageevent-url: Returns the URL of the document whose storage item changed.
storageevent-storagearea: Returns the Storage object that was affected.
